= Main Tools =
* Windows 7 VM
* Mod Compendium v1.6.1
* UMDGen


= General Instructions =

* Extract games umd0.cpk with UMDGen
* Put mods in mod compendium mods subfolder. 
* Use Mod Compendium to generate a new umd0.cpk
    * you can select mods to apply there
    * Click Build
* Open the game again in UMDGen
* Replace the umd0.cpk with the newly created cpk
* Build the game again
